Comment: This whole idea of a "Trump Budget" (or a "Biden Budget", or an "Obama Budget", or a "Bush Budget") is absurd.  The Legislative Branch has the power of the purse!  If enough Congress-critters think the Budget appropriates too much to Defense, well don't vote for the damn thing!  If it doesn't get enough votes, Trump doesn't even have a chance to sign (or veto) it!
